AmaReview Summarizer: Multi-Lingual AI-Powered Review Analysis

This Chrome extension summarizes reviews from Amazon product pages in multiple languages, running entirely locally on the user's machine for enhanced privacy.

Key Features

- Automatically detects Amazon product pages across various regional domains
- Analyzes customer reviews in multiple languages
- Generates concise, multi-lingual summaries of the reviews
- Operates 100% locally (not third party server to call APIs), ensuring user privacy
- Utilizes a customizable UI for user interaction
- Supports multiple AI models and APIs compatible with the OpenAI API format, including:
  - Perplexity AI models (e.g., llama-3-sonar-large-32k-chat)
  - OpenAI models (e.g., GPT-3.5-turbo, GPT-4)
  - Custom API endpoints for advanced users
- Allows users to choose their preferred AI model for summarization

Benefits

- Saves time for international shoppers by condensing lengthy reviews in various languages
- Helps users quickly understand the overall sentiment about a product, regardless of the review language
- Potentially assists in making more informed purchasing decisions across global Amazon marketplaces
- Ensures user data privacy by processing all information locally
- Provides flexibility in AI model selection to balance between performance and cost

How It Works

1. Navigate to any Amazon product page
2. Click the extension icon to open the interface
3. Select your preferred AI model or API
4. Click "Summarize Reviews" to generate a concise, multi-lingual summary
5. Read the AI-generated summary to get a quick overview of the product's reception

Experience the power of multi-lingual, AI-driven review summarization while keeping your data private and maintaining control over the AI models you use.
